summary:
Energetic broad based and versatile FMCG supply chain manager having a solid track record in several functional disciplines within the E2E supply chain (Source, Make, Plan, E2E supply chain projects), in international and local environments.

Expertise: E2E supply chain projects, Value improvement projects, Operational and Change management, Demand & Supply, Inventory management, Portfolio & Innovation management, Complexity reduction. Leading several departments like ; Demand planning, Co Packing, supply planning.

Highly motivated to deliver business results by connecting the dots between several supply chain interfaces. With a wide scope of interest and embracing new challenges. Making the supply chain fit to compete in the future with transparency to all layers of the organization.

Like being challenged on a daily basis on my expertise with direct involvement, project planning and implementing complex Supply Chain solutions. Leading team/departments within the supply chain to deliver result and develop team/individual skills and competences to ensure continuous improvement and succession.

Doing so with a strong “hands on mentality”, being decisive, enthusiastic and engaged with people. Leading people and/or solutions forward by example combined with a team player spirit.

education.field_of_study: Logistics, Materials, and Supply Chain Management

profile_positions.description:
Set up Basics off End to End Supply Chain within start up.
-Customer ordering (include OTC)
-Demand & Supply planning 
-Logistics network
-WMS
-Support Factory implementation team with acquiring production systems.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Manager EMA

profile_positions.description:
BPO Demand and Supply
- Build Centre of excellence

-Owner of program interface between BU and IT system and external partners to ensure delivery against the BU goals.

profile_positions.description:
Transforming Supply planning team.
Restructure and reestablish process, R&R's between supply team and factory's.
Resulting in increase of output over 30% 
Prepair for "cut-over" go live SAP/HANA Supply planning team.
profile_positions.title: EU Supply Planning manager a.i

profile_positions.description:
Duties and responsibilities:
•	Primary Manager for team of 5 team leaders that are each managing teams of 8 to 20 representatives.
•	Responsible for performance management, discipline, and terminations.
•	Create and foster a positive, collaborative environment where your team can learn and thrive.
•	Stabilize and predict output and identifying improvement programs to keep and improve output.
•	Generate link between production and back/frontoffice.
•	Conduct effective team meetings by facilitating learning, encouraging group participation and creating impact.
•	Coach team leaders to identify and address specific areas of focus to drive agent performance.
•	Mentor and develop team leaders to become proficient within organizational structure and progress as future operational leaders.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager a.i

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for driving the Supply Chain execution for on time in full launch to markets or New product developments. Defining run strategy optimizing cost vs service.
•	Responsible for full Supply Chain E2E mapping in new or emerging Markets, form source till RTM, LSP set up and selection.
•	Co-shape standards (processes and templates) across the functions that are required to materialize project (these are R&D, Marketing, Operations, Procurement, Artwork teams)
•	Deliver the supply chain standards and optimization project with Procurement.
•	Support Manufacturing footprint studies.
profile_positions.title: Global Supply Chain Program Manager a.i

profile_positions.description:
•	Introduction in S&OP.
•	Defining intercompany process, roles and responsibilities, S&OP rhythm & decisions structure.
•	Change management to result in effective and clear communication between all departments to ensure delivery of Business targets at right cost.
profile_positions.title: S&OP consult

profile_positions.description:
Duties and responsibilities:
•	Executing simultaneous both roles reporting to SC director and EIB director.
•	Responsible for continuing improvement processes, teams and all KPI’s.
•	Additional task’s:
o	SC BPO of developing/implementing change from S&OP to full IBP (18 months rolling) process.
o	Change management in IBP process.
o	Responsible for Demand planning participation in 2 warehouse moves within NL with no impact on CSL
profile_positions.title: EIB SC development process & Planning Manager BENLUX a.i.

profile_positions.description:
Duties and responsibilities:
•	Responsible for identifying the E2E overseas product flow and key market & physical logistic drivers.
•	Develop BU model & supporting tooling’s to enable implementation of overseas S&OP process.
•	Leading the developed process in the BU resulting in FAC improvement of 40%.
•	Enable development of a sustainable EIB BU strategy. 
•	Functional reporting to EIB director.
•	Performance/ change management coach for Benelux SC DP team. Supporting the Planning manager to implement heartbeat (weekly, monthly kpi and reporting rhythm with effective follow up of the improvement actions). Enabling to increase effectiveness of the full planning team.  Increase their awareness of their BU partner roll in the BU teams.
profile_positions.title: EIB (Exported International Brands) SC development process manager a.i.

profile_positions.description:
Duties and responsibilities:
•	A.I Planning Manager during her maternity leave
•	Managing 9 FTE, reporting to the SC director, SCLT member, and functional MT member in S&OP/GPS process.
•	Leading planning and new product introduction team (5 FTE in NL office, 4FTE in BE office) responsible for foods and milks nutrition in the Benelux.  Responsible for KPI’s; Fac, Fbias, CSL, WC, WO, DOH.
•	Responsible for development of BENELUX S&OP process, leading the full implementation in both countries.
•	Responsible for developing stock control process related to inbound flow from 6 factories and 15 3d party factories and co packers and operational process for product introductions. 
•	Developing planning tools and processes to improve forecasting, reduce obsoletes, manage stock and bring products to the market from an operational perspective.
•	Lead Improvement process to optimize synergy between NL and BE.
profile_positions.title: Planning Manager Benelux a.i.
Interim Manager Demand Planning & Supply Chain Support NL a.i

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the European inventory management. 
• Compose and drive inventory reduction program. 
• Develop and implement new tools and methodologies on inventory management.
• Generate A “ DNA” change, in the European E2E supply chain, from risk averse to calculated risk management.

Two key elements are leading in this role; 
• Change management within the operational field of the European network with 10 + factories, 7 + Multi Country Organisations and numerous suppliers.  

• Leading in providing the right insight on the true stock drivers. Develop program/roadmap, reporting tools and subsystems to drive this change and accelerate the inventory delivery.

Resulting in moving the organisation toward transparent calculated risk management in respects of service, inventory and cost with a strong business support and consensus.
profile_positions.title: Inventory Manager Spreads and Dressings Europe

profile_positions.description:
Representing Procurement towards  SC, R&D, Brand Development.Being the key interface for:
• Innovation agenda, 
• Value improvement, 
• Complexity management and supply chain improvement projects (focused on E2E service and supplier integration). 

Making the translation between the Business Growth Strategy towards Procurement and transfer/translate the procurement strategy with the relevant categories. Ensuring they are been inline maximizing their benefit.  

Business partnering to Supply Chain, Marketing (global and regional), Research and Development and Sales.
profile_positions.title: Procurement Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible of creating the optimum inbound supply chain and the execution on all sourcing related projects.By optimizing internal process and team and external relation managemeant with our supplier base.

- Supply Chain Project lead BENELUX responsible for implementing European restructuring & source strategy. Transferring 3 major supplying sites. 
- Team leader for Belgium supply and demand team.
- Member of the Belgium management team.
- Budget monitoring for obsoletes, AC volumes, stocks
- Lead S&OP implementation within the Belgian Food solutions organization (B2B market).
- Supply Chain project manager capable of delivering supply chain excellence in chilled innovations in the inflight channel (24/7 SC).
profile_positions.title: Sourcing manager Foodsolutions

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for; short and long term demand planning based on internal and external market intelligence, Leading the Sales and Operations Planning process and cycle. 

Lead in case of supply issues caused by demand or supply variations. Participated in several restructuring and reallocations projects and been acknowledged for solid execution. Balancing business and people objectives.

Surpassed demand and supply improvement goals and KPI's 3 consecutive years in a row.
profile_positions.title: Demand and Supply Planner
